title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

Scoring Note: Examples of appropriate labels for the force due to gravity include: F G , F g , F grav , W , mg , Mg , “grav force,” “F Earth on block,” “F on block by Earth,” F Earth on block , F E,Block , F Block,E . The labels G or g are not appropriate labels for the force due to gravity. F n , F N , N , “normal force,” “ground force,” or similar labels may be used for the normal force.

Scoring Note: If extraneous forces are present, a maximum of 2 points can be earned.
